issue.title: [C++] Improve UTF8 validation speed and CSV string conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10313](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10313). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Based on profiling from ARROW-10308, UTF8 validation is a bottleneck of CSV string conversion.

This is because we must validate many small UTF8 strings individually.
